pricing.question1: Can I try Declair for free?
pricing.answer1: Yes! You get 14 days free access to all Professional features. No credit card needed. After the trial period, you can choose which plan suits you best.
pricing.question2: Can I upgrade or downgrade at any time?
pricing.answer2: Yes, you can anytime adjust your plan. Upgrading gives you immediate access to new features. Downgrading keeps your current plan active until the end of the period.
pricing.question3: What are the transaction costs for payments?
pricing.answer3: Declair does not charge any transaction costs. You only pay the costs of the payment provider (Mollie): €0.29 per iDEAL transaction and 1.8% + €0.25 for credit card.
pricing.answer4: Yes, you can cancel at any time. You keep access to your account until the end of your payment period. You can always export your data.
pricing.question5: Do I get a discount for yearly payment?
pricing.answer5: Yes! With yearly payment you get 2 months free. That's a savings of more than 16%.
pricing.question6: Are the prices inclusive or exclusive of VAT?
pricing.answer6: All prices mentioned are exclusive of 21% VAT. As a business owner you can often deduct the VAT.

btw-aangifte-tips-zzp.title: VAT Return as a Freelancer: 7 Tips to Avoid Mistakes
btw-aangifte-tips-zzp.excerpt: VAT returns can be tricky. With these 7 practical tips you avoid common mistakes and save time.
btw-aangifte-tips-zzp.author: Jan de Boer

content.intro: As a freelancer, you are responsible for your own VAT return. This can be quite stressful, especially when you're just starting out. In this article we share 7 practical tips to avoid common mistakes.
content.heading1: 1. Keep your administration up to date
content.paragraph1: The basis of a correct VAT return is good administration. Save all invoices and receipts immediately and categorize them. With Declair you can scan receipts and they are automatically processed.
content.paragraph2: In the Netherlands we have three VAT rates: 0%, 9% and 21%. Make sure you know which rate applies to your products or services. Incorrect rates can lead to additional assessments.
content.tipContent: Set automatic reminders for your VAT return deadlines. That way you never forget a return.
content.paragraph3: Before you submit the return, always check your calculations. Add up the amounts again and compare with your bank statements. Small errors can have big consequences.
content.conclusion: With these tips you are well prepared for your next VAT return. Want to make it even easier? Declair automatically calculates your VAT and prepares your return.

factureren-beginners-gids.title: Invoicing for Beginners: The Complete Guide
factureren-beginners-gids.excerpt: Everything you need to know about professional invoicing as a starter. From required information to smart tips.
factureren-beginners-gids.author: Lisa Jansen

content.intro: Just started as an entrepreneur? Then invoicing is one of the first things you need to learn. In this complete guide we explain everything.
content.heading1: What should be on an invoice?
content.paragraph1: An invoice must meet legal requirements. Think of your company name, Chamber of Commerce number, VAT number, invoice number, date, and of course the amount including VAT specification.
content.heading2: When do you send an invoice?
content.paragraph2: Send your invoice as soon as possible after delivery of your product or service. The faster you invoice, the faster you get paid.
content.tipContent: Use an invoicing program like Declair to create professional invoices. That way you never forget required information.
content.heading3: How do you make sure you get paid?
content.paragraph3: Add a payment link to your invoice, set clear payment terms and send timely reminders. With Declair this all happens automatically.
content.conclusion: Professional invoicing is essential for your business. With the right tools and knowledge you make it a lot easier for yourself.

bonnetjes-scannen-ocr.title: Scanning Receipts with OCR: How It Works
bonnetjes-scannen-ocr.excerpt: Never lose receipts again. Discover how OCR technology simplifies your administration.
bonnetjes-scannen-ocr.author: Mark Peters

content.intro: OCR stands for Optical Character Recognition. This technology recognizes text on images, such as receipts. But how does it work exactly?
content.paragraph1: OCR technology analyzes an image and recognizes the text on it. Modern AI makes this increasingly accurate, even with curled or faded receipts.
content.paragraph2: You always have a digital backup, receipts are searchable, and the data is automatically processed in your administration. No more manual retyping.
content.tipContent: Scan receipts immediately after purchase. This prevents them from fading or getting lost.
content.paragraph3: Declair uses advanced AI to analyze receipts. Amount, date, supplier and VAT are automatically recognized and filled in.
content.conclusion: With OCR technology you save hours on your administration. Try it yourself and experience the convenience.

sneller-betaald-krijgen.title: 5 Ways to Get Paid Faster
sneller-betaald-krijgen.excerpt: Late payments are frustrating. With these 5 strategies you get your money faster.
sneller-betaald-krijgen.author: Jan de Boer

content.intro: Waiting for payments is one of the biggest frustrations of entrepreneurs. Fortunately, there are strategies to improve this.
content.paragraph1: With an iDEAL payment link your customer can pay directly from the invoice. This greatly lowers the threshold and speeds up payments by an average of 11 days.
content.paragraph2: A payment term of 14 days often works better than 30 days. Customers tend to pay faster with shorter terms.
content.tipContent: Invoices with a payment link are paid on average 11 days faster than invoices without.
content.paragraph3: Set automatic reminders on day 7, 14 and 21 after the due date. Friendly but clear.
content.conclusion: With these strategies you significantly improve your cash flow. Declair helps you with automatic payment links and reminders.

urenregistratie-freelancers.title: Time Tracking for Freelancers: Best Practices
urenregistratie-freelancers.excerpt: Effective time tracking is essential for freelancers. Discover the best methods and tools.
urenregistratie-freelancers.author: Lisa Jansen

content.intro: As a freelancer, your time is literally worth money. That's why it's crucial to keep track of your hours properly.
content.paragraph1: Accurate time tracking ensures that you invoice correctly, have insight into your productivity, and have proof in discussions with customers.
content.paragraph2: Manual tracking in Excel works, but is error-prone. A tool with timer function is more accurate and less work.
content.tipContent: Start your timer at the beginning of each task. That way you never forget to track hours.
content.paragraph3: With Declair you can convert tracked hours directly into invoices. Select the hours, click invoice, done.
content.conclusion: Good time tracking is the basis of a healthy freelance business. Invest in a good tool and make it a habit.

boekhouding-uitbesteden-of-zelf-doen.title: Outsource Accounting or Do It Yourself?
boekhouding-uitbesteden-of-zelf-doen.excerpt: The pros and cons of doing your own accounting versus outsourcing to a professional.
boekhouding-uitbesteden-of-zelf-doen.author: Mark Peters

content.intro: A question many entrepreneurs ask themselves: should I outsource my accounting or can I do it myself? We list the pros and cons.
content.paragraph1: You save costs, have direct insight into your finances, and get to know your business better. With modern tools it's also getting easier.
content.paragraph2: A professional knows all the rules, saves you time, and can advise on tax optimizations. Ideal when your business grows.
content.tipContent: Do your daily administration yourself with a tool like Declair, and let an accountant handle your annual accounts and complex matters.
content.paragraph3: The choice depends on your time investment, complexity of your business, and budget. Many freelancers choose a hybrid approach.
content.conclusion: There is no right or wrong answer. Choose what fits your situation and evaluate regularly if it still works.

kilometerregistratie-belastingvoordeel.title: Mileage Tracking: Maximum Tax Benefit
kilometerregistratie-belastingvoordeel.excerpt: Business miles are deductible. Learn how to register this correctly and benefit maximally.
kilometerregistratie-belastingvoordeel.author: Jan de Boer

content.intro: Do you regularly drive for business? Then you can deduct these miles from your taxes. But how do you do that correctly?
content.paragraph1: Trips to customers, suppliers, meetings and trade fairs are business. Commuting usually doesn't count if you have a fixed workplace.
content.paragraph2: Note date, start and end address, purpose of the trip, and the number of miles. A digital registration is most convenient and is accepted by the Tax Authority.
content.tipContent: The tax-free mileage allowance is €0.23 per kilometer. With your own car you can also calculate the actual costs.
content.paragraph3: With the Declair app you can automatically register trips via GPS. Afterwards you indicate which trips were business.
content.conclusion: Good mileage tracking can save you hundreds of euros per year in tax benefits. It's worth it!
